agents.name: VendorIntakeAgent
agents.role: Process new vendor applications, extract company information, validate registration details, and create vendor profiles in the system.
agents.task: Extract vendor details including company name, registration numbers (PAN, GST, Tax ID), contact information, banking details, and business classifications. Validate format and completeness of submitted documents.

agents.name: RiskGuardAgent
agents.role: Evaluate vendor risk profiles based on financial stability, compliance history, industry risks, and geographic factors. Assign risk bands (LOW/MEDIUM/HIGH) and recommend risk mitigation strategies.
agents.task: Analyze vendor data to assess financial risk, compliance risk, operational risk, and reputational risk. Calculate risk scores for quality, delivery, and compliance. Provide risk band classification and monitoring recommendations.

agents.name: ContractCraftAgent
agents.role: Generate Master Service Agreements (MSAs) tailored to vendor risk profiles, industry standards, and company policies. Flag risky clauses and suggest negotiation points.
agents.task: Create contract templates with appropriate terms, payment conditions, delivery schedules, and compliance requirements. Identify and highlight any risky or non-standard clauses in vendor-submitted contracts.

agents.name: InvoiceIQAgent
agents.role: Extract invoice data from digital and scanned documents, validate against purchase orders and goods receipts, verify tax calculations (CGST/SGST), and flag discrepancies.
agents.task: Process invoice documents to extract invoice number, date, vendor details, line items, amounts, and tax breakdowns. Match with PO/GR data, validate calculations, and categorize invoice status (APPROVED/PENDING/REJECTED).

agents.name: PayFlowAgent
agents.role: Schedule payments based on approved invoices, payment terms, and cash flow optimization. Generate payment instructions and track payment status.
agents.task: Process approved invoices for payment execution. Calculate payment dates based on terms (Net 30/45/60), prepare payment batches, and generate payment receipts. Track payment status and reconcile with bank statements.

agents.name: Supplier360Agent
agents.role: Analyze supplier performance metrics including on-time payment rates, dispute rates, cycle times, quality scores, and delivery performance. Generate actionable insights and renewal recommendations.
agents.task: Aggregate data across all stages to calculate supplier KPIs: total invoices processed, amounts paid, payment performance, dispute rates, average cycle times, and quality/delivery/compliance scores. Provide trend analysis (IMPROVING/STABLE/DECLINING) and recommendations (RENEW/MONITOR/RETENDER).
